title: Short-Window Sliding Learning for Real-Time Violence Detection via LLM-based Auto-Labeling
summary: This paper proposes a Short-Window Sliding Learning framework for real-time violence detection in CCTV footages. Unlike conventional long-video training approaches, the proposed method divides videos into 1-2 second clips and applies Large Language Model (LLM)-based auto-caption labeling to construct fine-grained datasets.
